newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Sept 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Sept 5.

text.p: Mitsubishi Rayon Co Ltd and the petrochemicals division of Thailand's Siam Cement Public Co will jointly set up an acrylic resin venture this month in Thailand.
Japan's Housing Loan Corp is expected to cut its mortgage rate by 0.1 point to 3.25 percent from next week.

Government panel proposes setting up a national system for cleaning up the growing volume of industrial waste dumped illegally and anonymously. The committee proposed two options for funding clean-ups -- charging all costs to waste-processing firms or dividing the costs between the government and the waste processors.
